suite.name: CalculatorTest

kw.name: Check And Open Application
kw.doc: Checks if application is running and sets the focus to the application,

kw.name: Wait Until Keyword Succeeds
kw.doc: Runs the specified keyword and retries if it fails.

kw.name: Window "Calculator" Should Be Open
kw.doc: Checks if ${p_window} has window, returns True if window is available, otherwise False.

kw.name: Run Keyword And Return Status
kw.doc: Runs the given keyword with given arguments and returns the status as a Boolean value.

kw.name: App Has Window
kw.doc: Returns `True` if application's window or dialog as specified in `app_name` is open,

kw.name: Should Be True
kw.doc: Fails if the given condition is not true.

kw.name: Run Keyword And Return Status
kw.doc: Runs the given keyword with given arguments and returns the status as a Boolean value.

kw.name: Should Match Regexp
kw.doc: Fails if ``string`` does not match ``pattern`` as a regular expression.

kw.name: Set Test Variable
kw.doc: Makes a variable available everywhere within the scope of the current test.

kw.name: Run Keyword If
kw.doc: Runs the given keyword with the given arguments, if ``condition`` is true.

kw.name: Split String To Characters
kw.doc: Splits the given ``string`` to characters.

kw.name: Click "${number}" Button
kw.doc: Clicks a button using the region constants in CalculatorTestConstants.robot

kw.name: Set New Search Region In Active App
kw.doc: Sets new ROI or the search area to a specified ``offsets`` based on original coordinate values of active application in focus.
kw.msg: Setting new search region to offsets '18, 244, -195, -296'.
New coordinates: x:'163' y:'650 w:'33 h:'26.

kw.name: Click Region
kw.doc: Left-clicks the center x,y coordinate of a specified ROI or search region.
kw.msg: Clicking specified ROI or search region 'R[163,650 33x26]@S(0)[0,0 1600x1200] E:Y, T:3.0'

kw.name: Click "${number}" Button
kw.doc: Clicks a button using the region constants in CalculatorTestConstants.robot

kw.doc: Sets new ROI or the search area to a specified ``offsets`` based on original coordinate values of active application in focus.

kw.msg: Clicking specified ROI or search region 'R[203,650 33x26]@S(0)[0,0 1600x1200] E:Y, T:3.0'

kw.doc: Runs the given keyword with given arguments and returns the status as a Boolean value.

kw.name: Should Match Regexp
kw.doc: Fails if ``string`` does not match ``pattern`` as a regular expression.

kw.name: Set Test Variable
kw.doc: Makes a variable available everywhere within the scope of the current test.

kw.name: Run Keyword If
kw.doc: Runs the given keyword with the given arguments, if ``condition`` is true.

kw.name: Click "Plus" Button
kw.doc: Clicks a button using the region constants in CalculatorTestConstants.robot

kw.doc: Returns the text in the specified region ${p_region}

kw.name: Set New Search Region In Active App

kw.name: Get Text In Search Region
kw.doc: Returns the text from a specified ``search location``.

kw.name: Should Be Equal
kw.doc: Fails if the given objects are unequal.

kw.name: Set Test Variable
kw.doc: Makes a variable available everywhere within the scope of the current test.

kw.name: Run Keyword If
kw.doc: Runs the given keyword with the given arguments, if ``condition`` is true.

kw.name: Split String To Characters
kw.doc: Splits the given ``string`` to characters.

kw.name: Click "${number}" Button
kw.doc: Clicks a button using the region constants in CalculatorTestConstants.robot

kw.name: Set New Search Region In Active App
kw.doc: Sets new ROI or the search area to a specified ``offsets`` based on original coordinate values of active application in focus.
kw.msg: Setting new search region to offsets '98, 180, -195, -296'.
New coordinates: x:'243' y:'586 w:'33 h:'26.

kw.name: Click Region
kw.doc: Left-clicks the center x,y coordinate of a specified ROI or search region.
kw.msg: Clicking specified ROI or search region 'R[243,586 33x26]@S(0)[0,0 1600x1200] E:Y, T:3.0'

kw.name: Run Keyword And Return Status
kw.doc: Runs the given keyword with given arguments and returns the status as a Boolean value.

kw.name: Should Match Regexp
kw.doc: Fails if ``string`` does not match ``pattern`` as a regular expression.

kw.name: Set Test Variable
kw.doc: Makes a variable available everywhere within the scope of the current test.

kw.name: Run Keyword If
kw.doc: Runs the given keyword with the given arguments, if ``condition`` is true.

kw.name: Click "Equals" Button
kw.doc: Clicks a button using the region constants in CalculatorTestConstants.robot

kw.name: Set New Search Region In Active App
kw.doc: Sets new ROI or the search area to a specified ``offsets`` based on original coordinate values of active application in focus.
kw.msg: Setting new search region to offsets '176, 244, -195, -265'.
New coordinates: x:'321' y:'650 w:'33 h:'57.

kw.name: Click Region
kw.doc: Left-clicks the center x,y coordinate of a specified ROI or search region.
kw.msg: Clicking specified ROI or search region 'R[321,650 33x57]@S(0)[0,0 1600x1200] E:Y, T:3.0'

kw.name: Then Actual Result Should Be Equal To "${expected_result}"
Get Text In "Calculator Result Screen" Region
kw.doc: Returns the text in the specified region ${p_region}

kw.name: Set New Search Region In Active App
kw.doc: Sets new ROI or the search area to a specified ``offsets`` based on original coordinate values of active application in focus.
kw.msg: Setting new search region to offsets '18, 61, -40, -274'.
New coordinates: x:'163' y:'467 w:'188 h:'48.

kw.name: Get Text In Search Region
kw.doc: Returns the text from a specified ``search location``.
kw.msg: Getting texts from at 'region' of specified ROI.

kw.name: Should Be Equal
kw.doc: Fails if the given objects are unequal.

kw.name: Close Application
kw.doc: Checks if the application matching the given ``app_name`` is running then closes it.

suite.doc: Calculator test suite for the common operations. Does not use patterns as parameters in the keywords but uses offsets of regions instead
